description:
+ [Added] - Google and apple login
+ [Added] - Guest cart management
+ [Added] - Category wise filter in product listing (App)
+ [Added] - Category re-order option (Admin panel)
+ [Added] - Date filter option (Partner app)
+ [Added] - Maintenance mode option [Website]
+ [Added] - Dark theme mode (Website)
+ [Added] - Delivery note (Admin panel, app, website)
+ [Added] - Custom sound for receive order (Partner app)
+ [Improved] - Cart list screen (Customer app)
+ [Improved] - Time slot module
+ [Improved] - Login module (Customer app, website)
+ [Fixes] -Other major ui improvements
